byline.original: By STEPHEN FARRELL and ETHAN BRONNER

abstract: Israel and Palestinians prepare for long-awaited prisoner exchange that will end five years in captivity for Israeli solder Gilad Shalit, and hundreds of Palestinians who have been held for much longer.
snippet: Each side prepared Monday for the handover that will end five years in captivity for one Israeli soldier, Gilad Shalit, and hundreds of the Palestinians who have been held for much longer.
lead_paragraph: Each side prepared Monday for the handover that will end five years in captivity for one Israeli soldier, Gilad Shalit, and hundreds of the Palestinians who have been held for much longer.

headline.main: Israel and Palestinians Prepare to Swap Prisoners
headline.print_headline: Israel and Palestinians Prepare to Swap Prisoners
